articles.description: Conor Gallagher scores twice as Chelsea come from behind to beat Crystal Palace at Selhurst Park.

articles.description: Patrick Mahomes again showed why he could chase down Tom Brady's records as he led the Kansas City Chiefs to back-to-back Super Bowl wins - and they believe glory can be theirs again next year.
articles.title: Super Bowl 2024: Patrick Mahomes steps up Tom Brady chase as leader of NFL's new dynasty

articles.description: Marathon world record holder Kelvin Kiptum was a "special talent" who would gone on to have an "incredible career", says Sir Mo Farah.
articles.title: Kelvin Kiptum dies: Sir Mo Farah says Kenyan was a 'special talent'

articles.description: Ivory Coast began the tournament as the underdogs of Afcon but rose to become champions.
articles.title: Afcon: Ivory Coast football fans flock to see Abidjan victory parade

articles.description: Teenager Luke Littler hits a nine-dart finish on his way to winning the title on his Players Championship debut.
articles.title: Luke Littler: Teenager hits nine-dart finish and wins Players Championship on debut

articles.description: Watch the Kansas City Chiefs celebrate after beating the San Francisco 49ers 25-22 in overtime to win their third Super Bowl in five years.
articles.title: Watch Chiefs celebrate Super Bowl win over 49ers

articles.description: Emma Raducanu says she "struggled with everything" as she was beaten by world number 30 Anhelina Kalinina in the first round of the Qatar Open.
articles.title: Emma Raducanu beaten by Anhelina Kalinina in first round of Qatar Open

articles.description: Which players impressed our football pundit Garth Crooks enough to make his latest Team of the Week?
articles.title: Who has looked imperious? Garth Crooks' Team of the Week

articles.description: Kylian Mbappe is unsure about Real Madrid's latest offer, Spurs are confident Ange Postecoglou will stay, PSG target Bernardo Silva, plus more.
articles.title: Mbappe unsure about Real offer - Tuesday's gossip

articles.description: Manchester City boss Pep Guardiola urges Erling Haaland to focus on feeling relaxed rather than scoring goals.
